授業の概要・背景: Spring Intensive English is a twice-a-week course designed to acclimate advanced proficiency first-year students to standard university English course expectations. Students will actively use English as a tool to complete various types of tasks. This will allow students to improve their English skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking), as well as other skills, such as organizing ideas, group work, public speaking etc.
授業方法: This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes will be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the pace of the course. General course format: This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving pair work, group work, and presentations. Students are expected to actively contribute to class discussions and respond to other students, including making comments and asking questions. They are also expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly schedule above is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students in due time.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to complete all the tasks assigned each week, in order to prepare for the class activities.
